title: How Affordable Are Kerala Houseboat Tours? (NehaShah)
text: By NehaShah Jul 22, 2015 The beauty of Kerala is worthy of appreciation in every way possible. If the locals residing in Kerala are to be believed, God himself took the command in creating this magnificent place. It is because of its awe struck beauty that this place is mostly referred by the nickname "God's own Country". The state is enriched in a long list exceptional elements that are very rare to be found anywhere across India. The best part of the state is that it nurtures distinct variety of climatic conditions if one browses across its territory. From a moderate climate to a chilling weather of the hills, this place is clearly meant for every breed of tourists. In a recent survey organized by an independent body, it was found that Kerala has a special place in the heart of an avid traveler. It is because of this compelling factor that tourists from around the world keep visiting this place all throughout the year. With a spectacular beauty and one of a kind aroma of its own, this place is poster figure for India's Tourism. Water bodies such as Paravurlake and few others have an outburst of tourists all season and are considered the most beautiful backwater destinations in India. Couples travelling on their honeymoon to Kerala never miss to visit the water bodies here. In order to experience a houseboat living, a majority of the tourists opt for Kerala houseboat tours. Almost every tourist group who look out for an amazing tour of this state by taking a series of Kerala Travel packages, strongly suggest their travel guides to keep houseboat tours at the top of their itinerary. Those visitors who come down to the state for anything other than leisure travel also go for a short Kerala houseboat package because of its unmatched popularity. Renowned tour and travel experts have come up with a valid theory behind the popularity of houseboat tours among travelers. They believe that it is the affordability factor that comes along with Kerala houseboat tours that makes it the most sought after. These tours can also be tailored made as per the requirement or demand of the subscriber. Kerala houseboat package not only promises a once in a life time experience at rock bottom prices to tourists but also gives them memorable memories to cherish. The state clearly has a lot to offer to its tourists on land but it also gives a much more serene and unforgettable experience while admiring it from any of its many water bodies. This place has won the hearts of any with its simplicity and outstanding hospitality. About the Author Author have 6 years of experience in Content marketing.
